comment: Oh dear! It looks like I am addicted to that kind of videos! 🙈 I live out of a backpack already, but this is soooo inspiring! 🥰 Thanks so much for making that video! And Rob... thank you so much for being such an amazing person! You're my hero! 👍
you dont need a lot to live by.
Might as well be a monk. Just saying....
Half of the video he is explaining that he lost something. 😂
What does he do with his notebooks when he’s done writing in them? Hopefully he doesn’t get rid of his thoughts, ideas, or memories that he’s written down. 🤗
Brother God bless you for spreading the knowledge that is actually meaningful. And I hope you are coming soon to Pakistan after the health conditions normalize worldwide coz Pakistan is missing u.
Very cool. Inspiring!
This is sooooo inspiring! I am a minimalist already. (Live out of a backpack in the UK) But I am still working HARD to minimize my stuff. Because... it makes me so happy! 💃

@MultiUnknown2 No, that's it. My 'sentimental items' are my tattoos on my body, my memories that I carry in my head and on pictures and my clothes. (Shirt from Malta, Jean's from Barcelona...) When I can't  use it I don't want it. 😉

Zoey Michael so you don’t have anything stored at parents homes or storage that you forget/don’t count. Just wandering like all the stuff you accumulate growing up from sentimental items and holiday souvenirs ect
@MultiUnknown2 I am a house sitter, so it is easy for me. 😉 But yes, all I own fits in a backpack. After a couple of years downsizing I finally managed to have only items that I really love. 😍
Zoey Michael do you have everything you own in a backpack also?

This was incredibly interesting.
Enjoyed listening to it. Kind
greetings from Switzerland.
Minimalism vs usefulness...

I LOVE what he said "My goal is to live in a way that my actions are aligned with my beliefs. Where I can wake up every day feeling good about life"


It's not about the items, it's about this.
LOL, Life goal, live like a Homeless Person? Oh, it'[s April 1st. LOL
@Rob Greenfield More power too you. We in today's society tend to think owning more things is good, when in fact all these things end up owning us.  Enjoy your adventure, sounds like fun.

Hi there,
I understand where you are coming from, but I am not experiencing homelessness. This is a choice, so it's quite different from people who are in really difficult situations and are without a home, not by choice, but by circumstances they can't control or overcome.
I can’t believe it 🙈
Really enjoyed this style of video. I can’t imagine having 44 items but props to him!
Hmmm...how does he get a plane ticket to Germany without a credit card? Really cool guy though!

I currently only fly if it is for the purpose of giving a talk. They cover the transportation.
Right now I'm on my Solutions Tour: http://robgreenfield.tv/worldsolutionstour/
Good question! Im sure he can answer that for ya
The book of my choice to carry at all times is the Bible. Try to understand God’s thoughts and wisdom he has to offer.
Woww very nice 👍👍😄
he forgot to mention the camera, battery, accessories, camera stand (presumably) that were filming him at the table with his stuff

I didn't forget that of course. I don't own any of these items. I film when I'm with people who have these items and who have a passion in producing videos and want to spread messages of sustainable living.
It was cool before he said he doesn't have a bank account. Freedom is being financially secure too.
I am financially secure, without a bank account. I have chosen security in different manner than mainstream will teach.  I cover this in more details on my YouTube channel
He admits that he takes it to the extreme, not as a model for everyone but to make think about how they live
Great video!
Secretly we all know 44 is for Obama 🤪
cringe
Wow! What an awesome person. I'm so glad you introduced him to us. Definitely going to check his channel and learning more about his message. Such an interesting person! Thank you
Glad to be a part of your life now Vicky! Sending love!
Wait until you check out his videos. You'll be hooked.
So, if someone were to rob him, he would have zero money. Also, where does he get his money from.... Just curious.

Correct, if I was robbed of my money, then I would have no money whatsoever.
I earn my money from public speaking.
Maybe he works with value directly
I’d guess his parents would help out.
Same tought...carrying cash in CR ...be careful😒😜

Hey everyone!
Rob Greenfield here. :)
If questions, please ask here and I'll answer some of them!
If you gained inspiration from this you are welcome to join me on my channel where you'll find a lot more.
https://www.youtube.com/user/RobJGreenfield
Health and happiness to you,
Rob
So great to meet you Siya and Kristen! I look forward to next time my friends. Sending a big hug! Keep spreading the good word.
Love it! Love y’all and Rob 😊, thanks for the interview, and more in depth look at his possessions
Glad you enjoyed it. He's a really cool guy.
Too bad it wasn’t 42. You know, the meaning of life.
Wait until you see what's he's doing next. Will be way less than 42!
Where is subtitles? I am from Bangladesh. It would be better if you provide us subtitles
Will be adding subtitles tomorrow.
C C dude...like really 🤣
